l:dependency.name: SMS Notification
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin allows the user to notify the team via SMS for any unstable build, using Hoiio API. Visit developer.hoiio.com to learn more about Hoiio API

l:dependency.name: ezmorph
l:dependency.l:description: Simple java library for transforming an Object to another Object.

l:dependency.name: json-lib
l:dependency.l:description: Java library for transforming beans, maps, collections, java arrays and XML to JSON.

l:dependency.name: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java
l:dependency.l:description:
Guava is a suite of core and expanded libraries that include utility classes, google's collections, io classes, and much much more.
Guava has two code dependencies - javax.annotation per the JSR-305 spec and javax.inject per the JSR-330 spec.

l:dependency.name: Commons Collections
l:dependency.l:description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

l:dependency.name: Commons BeanUtils
l:dependency.l:description: BeanUtils provides an easy-to-use but flexible wrapper around reflection and introspection.

l:dependency.name: Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.
